TopicTitle: Challenge: Make a flyby mission over Minmus, but you must have a periapsis below 4KM.

Articles.Content:
I did this using my Orion MPCV, I got my Perpiapsis to 3.7KM above sea level.

Rules: No hyperedit, no cheating (But I can't find out if your cheating or not really.), Craft must return back to Kerbin in one piece (Image required), MechJeb is allowed, you must show images of you skimming over the surface of Minmus, it does not have to be a full orbit for mine was a high velocity flyby.

Excited to see some fancy pictures.
